title: Mark Knoller, longtime CBS News correspondent, dies at 73
description: Longtime CBS News correspondent Mark Knoller has died. Friends and colleagues remember Knoller as a legend. Knoller joined CBS News in 1988, covering the president and becoming a fixture on America's radio airwaves, and sometimes on TV. He was 73.
